parameters.content:
Need to solve for the following:

* Approval workflow friction - make it internal

* Dynamic selection - Edward or Michael's board

* Search step on Monday - Get item and make update, or sth...

parameters.description: Call this tool to create Monday items when needed. You are required to send over an item's information in the format specified.

parameters.toolDescription: Get many board groups on a Monday.com board.
parameters.boardId: ={{ $fromAI('board_id', "The Board ID for which to find board groups", "number", 0) }}

nodes.name: Get Groups on a Monday.com Board

parameters.toolDescription: Get many items on a Monday.com board
parameters.boardId: ={{ $fromAI('board_id', "The Board ID for which to find items from", "number", 0) }}
parameters.groupId: ={{ $fromAI('group_id', "The Group ID for which to find board groups", "number", 0) }}

nodes.name: Get Many Items on a Monday.com Board

parameters.toolDescription: Add an update to an item in Monday.com. Ensure that you pass in the necessary item ID, for the item to add an update to, and the update text to add for that item.

nodes.name: Add an update to an item in Monday.com

parameters.toolDescription: Create an item in Edward's high priority board group in Monday.com. Use this to create any items as requested, if they are to be created on Edward's board.
parameters.name: ={{ $fromAI('name') }}

nodes.name: Create an item on Edward's Monday.com board

parameters.toolDescription:
This node GETs active items on Edward's Monday board by using the Monday API. The Query Parameter should be formatted in proper GraphQL Syntax as defined by the Monday API documentation.

Most other operations such as creating items on Monday boards can be performed using methods defined in Monday documentation using the Monday API.
parameters.jsonBody: { "query": "query { boards(ids: [6038686507]) { items_page(limit: 500, query_params: {order_by: [{column_id: \"date\", direction: desc}], rules: [{column_id: \"group\", compare_value: [\"topics\", \"emailed_items54872\", \"group_mknxbpdn\", \"group_title\"], operator: any_of}, {column_id: \"status\", compare_value: [10, 15, 1, 17, 1, 12, 11], operator: not_any_of}], operator: and}) { cursor items { id name group { id title } column_values(ids: [\"date\", \"status\", \"label\"]) { id text value } } } } }" }

nodes.name: Get Items on Edward's Monday Board

query.prompt:
Create a new item on Edward Njogu's board summarizing Michael's request: Research and provide guidance on migrating EOS tokens from Coinbase to a self-custodial wallet (Exodus) and swapping them for the new A token via the official migration portal. Include deadline: within the next week; not urgent.

After creating the item, research the EOS token migration process, key terms, and actionable steps, then add these notes to the same item. Include:
- Key terms: EOS, Token Migration, Vaulta (A), Self-custodial wallet, Exodus, Coinbase, Migration Portal, Compatible wallets.
- Action Steps:
  1. Move EOS tokens from Coinbase to self-custodial wallet (e.g. Exodus).
  2. Access the official migration portal using provided links.
  3. Follow the migration steps to swap EOS for A token.
  4. Note: Coinbase will not auto-convert tokens; deadline is not set.
  5. Reference official Coinbase support/help links for latest updates and support.

json.prompt:
Create a new item on Edward Njogu's board summarizing Michael's request: Research and provide guidance on migrating EOS tokens from Coinbase to a self-custodial wallet (Exodus) and swapping them for the new A token via the official migration portal. Include deadline: within the next week; not urgent.

After creating the item, research the EOS token migration process, key terms, and actionable steps, then add these notes to the same item. Include:
- Key terms: EOS, Token Migration, Vaulta (A), Self-custodial wallet, Exodus, Coinbase, Migration Portal, Compatible wallets.
- Action Steps:
  1. Move EOS tokens from Coinbase to self-custodial wallet (e.g. Exodus).
  2. Access the official migration portal using provided links.
  3. Follow the migration steps to swap EOS for A token.
  4. Note: Coinbase will not auto-convert tokens; deadline is not set.
  5. Reference official Coinbase support/help links for latest updates and support.
json.context:
Full Context:

Email Subject Line: Fwd: Fwd: EOS TOKEN MIGRATION

From: Edward Njogu<edward@storiedinc.com>

Below is a request from Michael to me.

* Please create this item on my board.

* Once created, research how to do this (including any key terms) and add those to the item you just created.

Thanks..

Michael's request:

Edward

Can you research and guide me on how to do this. I have a bunch of EOS tokens in Coinbase that need to be transferred to my self custodial wallet Exodus.

Not urgent, but good to do in the next week or so.

EOS Token (EOS) Migration

We’re reaching out with an update regarding the migration of the EOS (EOS) token to Vaulta (A). If you hold these tokens, here’s what you need to know:
*What's Happening?*

The EOS token is being replaced by A as part of a project upgrade.

To continue using your tokens, you’ll need to swap your EOS tokens for A through the official migration portal ( https://links.coinbase.com/s/c/ePPeOFRnDqaWdsJnwJVmskOPTrBQkKx9M9dOQK7NcPoLEi62rHFmpfJSv9ZM0k8xpzcOfZ_ZVyC5s86K1y7sYuPO0rTu7YwdQfFfcDXWdpeVm-Psa-T6CZR_klpJwSJoY_Tstk0KLnVUz5U8MF5DHa1S-hrZcPDQioMLJRrCc9AD12wHLgtTl3trRgIqizB9HHjsfx1oU3dLCOsCZihFBTi60WHQB4p4dDQWJ0REOjc1W97FWWKB7Xx5mM2YCFkqLK81rq9CZhsuvhxZmtJ85ov8Yr4GyLCuZKR3ADUIyGyKoes5UDs8RSzGC_A9WM7O6uy8uB-BAV5-AWq-Nq5P6pN-c_e7LICgfH7KFuT6ERnWRrERq36jn57dfgV3fYbX1q5nWZfiqoGMN7iV4-3LL22wYfviD8elC4owW-aoZ9T3k45S_8UlRw92ZN3DOTT_usdWnzyxqBiC-mG7H42m3yD42_cQUyRiYSQIjEdozj7mmB2iu9vLcgQxxO5QwQUkJJbVrtU-o6t63DygVXIVaau4oXKiHSawnal6sVMCfDOB928uEMIuvN5_5Gtm32w7z7Maqu2OniY-rfcvhkWrs_8/mtdy3U2zMG_u4gv6iBNit9Fb_b6uQ3G6/8 ). You can find more details about the migration and how to swap your tokens here ( https://links.coinbase.com/s/c/NRAvwLBUIhX4RRJP6XeWNHGYtGYcj1hqDMa_Q4eNFNUgMkC47J-C6f4pLthyKnJ2LVTk5DSibWR7_NxMkxI94B8WPPn5WvCP8S0JpKmsc2K5vQQ2fZx2XEdoajXAqjfxiTh4ocUJSUD9UKj4XhRa75boKQyouPzepN6mOUv2161Hv7247GaQIn8gX8YSaTGyfAsSmrHq4rUHbjB9gRzGKS1uHuhQrAyXm0TiXYPu3MfVe_gmXwg_swfCiqnmscnTyrDqISaz5tbu7ydDlTipTL06MzWfcqXIXriK9oe07A9mDQAUONXj-G98pc62zM5H0Wpmps3yrBTCUJOfH2-wow2qIES1gB5ITyqTdOpZyIE-mrdp9NQ4D0qvM3ow5T2T9Z2y4nPYu1GjCTK9GxCHkIxnWfsOcR8ZS-Se3F4_nTFoqKXG1DWDP5tifbj19lO8DEu1jpjJBFAZCKmFNySwzFBketem_QgM_k0WWM3WUxHyHuafGC1yqnyGz4U2HAgMFKBWOl05UJCNgQP0WWPVOB48EebK0-C-Hp157O3i5mrGCoj0fQ42AKPxE2mUNMyYRfMoE2ZQ0Wk3tGckuA/vjiI-VvwLkM7mdaQOse853E7S_2LHx0Z/8 ). A list of wallets compatible with the EOS Native network can be found here ( https://links.coinbase.com/s/c/y-FvBJr_0_o_jMkI1-Bof6mAtQ2pGfH2Fi3JIao8HjPLNY5JbJYGYA9D3KIUyYmX0LC5BmPc8gdc6DrVeuUDPFEwxXLKS_JM4c3Sth0_fl9iEj9MSMjWoP5Yr8GBchtpRP2kcbFKUjVlYaclg_RrOKIKVx2tdqe60fxhxNfRf66c0C020NGAmNUY2lG1rmIZ4dQfrxLuYVxzoIhsrShRkbU8vLN8OMUjvXs_nzuhbdw3Djg8LBSt9aMmTg9Oo_pGpSC_GSEkbk7LxDAvdIKFcWO3H2MheuAl1qvBgkk89hbCtA1bPq-Zju9NujvtDurPPAoBB2rSePu1e4tEjY4hXrthSdyl-4dPEY5OE0Yv00Cd3Sh960KJDYis6KxzqrIHR9r_Hu7Q2f7ZnX7Hepb8hY7lsrlDyQXsj7x4ONalDQx40SHQbtxsna0av65hUBa43zXyvZLTmy-U8V5XElItiaLhwf68voXthO5rQCoom5SjxHcLsM_DocgxNwZ1p6O7-Xk7/w7CYU89OMM_k5desr84tGJVyYGnCOiZm/8 ).

*What This Means for You*

* Coinbase will NOT automatically convert your tokens.

* To swap your tokens, you’ll need to move them to a compatible self-custodial wallet before completing the migration.

* There’s no set deadline right now, so you have time to make the switch.

*How to Swap Your Tokens*

1. Move your EOS tokens to a self-custodial wallet.

2. Go to the official migration portal ( https://links.coinbase.com/s/c/VwX2LWHE5Li1L02Jvlr3Py-r8pZT94CuP-IkxxZf0QR4zMtxN0IxJK3lZkbeEACg8rfRjmX4Pzie11HlY48BLowSnsvVQIoNf3CBcLLm5m36gfUk3bX1JP__6WWkjcfCRh6QV5fKbZ7cj3aNN1EHGOtLeXCXyxVKMolweClJNc54-mpn-WgsPmsmLTqKsuCznzhy2KYoVEdkD0EwVeEWyfDWViGJ1EaW6KfN7bM3u1IWuZXWYozPsxCoqmMgVbhCafd1R3rO59es9Cd_OQtkgCbfbvjZtruC-JQSYStKwzwa4H3wAxPOZL2in4Tuxm0ZXFY1Akd7cIT4TGjVdkTAR4PUEwx-F180vsh9r8OruGoNV_T36WgmbxqalS9i_gRKpMFWZi8A71EZtYseyJqPciv-xoLHbgG_q4BfdSNqxikfHuaYMzv8hFDJaYtO6bUHzm9sntvKhoC0TRlOq0nDXtAdVfxJcISd8Pzb52gXogzTbqe_N_X6cAInqGBu3CBfheb-YrVA7Y9QuKHFDiCmbrnGD-c7eCJA-nKB_IxRbrMNCKspefUDMoVjCCK03tQr84mxsmbPorYJLfnTBH_a-v0/Qnqk_Asx-gE8xAb0EDywB1YTxOdQXDZk/8 ).

3. Follow the steps to swap your EOS for A.

Once completed, you’ll now hold A, which replaces your old tokens.

If you have any questions regarding this update, please visit Coinbase Help ( https://comm.coinbase.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Flinks.coinbase.com%2Fs%2Fc%2F55xIkh24v27PO4xDb46euXXgpfjamxO9u8-a0jqjsbHexScoNtXmETNUK2eYkPirzV4Z-izgmBBQQHcEZ6Evxq4CI555_fRia4Uzs2I-ktn0NT9GOcP4mXEqB2J0HkVGwUPtba2RgLITATU59cy059ldQGvAVqx9WFgz8H8wbjD1-w2y91kaC3tI5F93-599g4u-9sFm5FR3o0QphKD_vyNz9IypDPszoG-zSir8qU9KY1fWlj9_mp9TirQ0xplQ3OWNGJnBOznHXRn0BKQAmQCbb88aFUTJl5eGW9MuMTKnKEYvsWUwYMTy3Unc48_hSqy2OVFUcMHgyH5cCoVTKWwoMwf18_bJgwSiaXxv7eOL8EceSUKjkzHdzaIGIKBNr-ErvRftHhnOxCtnddNH1kIzlOeItRR2HJ2Kmv2IBnD6bX2B69kv2wbJn45W7ySKpAjREoAd9gi8Ktb-ftT9zWRfsM3KihNsoNn7%2FiBAnlBB0QUE1TT2nI2CLp3h2g2bF2eDa%2F8/1/01000196d0311f77-a923b062-b3b0-4b63-b087-7c960cf7e90a-000000/hkSlul5D4C7ZF9GGXDhgv11O1edbXp1thiAnikG6xO0=405 ).
